item.title: CVE-2014-8182|2024-08-06T13:10:51.060Z -- openldap -- openldap
item.description: An off-by-one error leading to a crash was discovered in openldap 2.4 when processing DNS SRV messages. If slapd was configured to use the dnssrv backend, an attacker could crash the service with crafted DNS responses.
